author: Oscar Wilde
message: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
title: Thought of the day

author: Margaret Wheatley
message: We know from science that nothing in the universe exists as an isolated or independent entity.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Everything in the universe goes by indirection. There are no straight lines.
title: Thought of the day

author: George Eliot
message: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
title: Thought of the day
